explains: adj. 存在主义的；有关存在的；存在判断的
wordGroup: existential philosophy 存在哲学；现代实存哲学

sentences.en: What is clear is that all sorts of government issues—education, health-insurance portability, worker retraining—arc no longer just bonuses to already prosperous lives but existential requirements.
sentences.cn: 清楚的是，政府的各种问题——教育、医疗保险的可转移性、员工再培训——不再仅仅是对已经富裕的生活的奖金，而是一种存在的需求。

sentences.en: Existential questions requiring religious answers still persist.
sentences.cn: 需要宗教解答的生命问题持续存在着。

sentences.en: "What if there's nothing left at all?" he cried, lost in some intense existential angst.
sentences.cn: “要是什么都没了会怎样？”他大叫起来，迷失在某种强烈的攸关人类存亡的痛苦中。
